ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Pete Costanza,Dick Beck,John Rosenberger,Pete Costanza,Dick Beck,John Rosenberger
ComicInfo.Title: I Gotta See to Everything!; Spawn of the Unknown!; Down, Down, Down!; From Tomorrow...to Yesterday!
ComicInfo.Summary:
I Gotta See to Everything!: Elihu Pokesworth has to return from the dead to demonstrate that Glenn Armister's construction company does shoddy work.
Spawn of the Unknown!: A hunter discovers a giant egg on a tropical island that hatches a baby Roc which he captures. Its parent comes from space to save the chick.
Down, Down, Down!: A cold hearted businessman employs a meek inventor to work for him. He appropriates all of his inventions including a powerful submarine that can travel to the deepest part of the ocean. When he tests the sub himself to get all the glory, it's attacked and destroyed by a deep sea dragon.
From Tomorrow...to Yesterday!: Dr. Harlow Winters speculates that an amnesia victim is a space traveler, but Trion is actually a time traveler.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Bob Standish,Greg Olivetti,Pierce Rand,Bob Standish,Greg Olivetti,Pierce Rand
